slide.title: A Jamaat-e-Islami activist was killed and three people, including two children, were injured in two separate incidents in Naogaon and Rajshahi during the Jamaat-enforced countrywide hartal yesterday.
A Jamaat-e-Islami activist was killed and three people, including two children, were injured in two separate incidents in Naogaon and Rajshahi during the Jamaat-enforced countrywide hartal yesterday.
